articles.title: Sony Launches Two New Wireless Speakers With 3D Spatial Sound - Forbes
articles.description: Sony has unveiled two new wireless speakers that can work with Google Home or Amazon Alexa. The speakers are capable of producing spatial 3D sound and the larger model is Hi-Res certified.
